full_summary:
**Tender Announcement:** Drivers License Readers for Royal Canadian Mounted Police
====================================
**Reference Number:** SSC-23-00024291/T
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** BPM019907/24291
**Publication Date:** 2023-10-26
**Closing Date:** 2023-11-14T14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
**Amendment Date:** 2023-11-08
**Contractor Notice:** Expired

**Getting Started:**
ISWORLD02IG2 Canada is inviting qualified suppliers to submit bids for the provision and delivery of Drivers License Readers for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Department. The successful supplier will be responsible for delivering the Drivers License Readers to multiple locations across Canada within 30 federal working days of contract award.

**Project Overview:**
The RCMP requires the provision and delivery of Drivers License Readers as per the requirement and terms and conditions outlined in the bid document. The supplier must be able to provide the specified Drivers License Readers.

**Deliverables:**
The supplier will be responsible for delivering the following:

* Drivers License Readers
* Installations support (if required)

**Contract Details:**
The proposed contract is intended to be a two-year contract with two one-year irrevocable options allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract.

**Security Requirements:**
This procurement is not covered by Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCA).

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is open to suppliers that are certified under the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and other applicable trade agreements.

**Solicitation Method:**
This procurement is a Request for Proposal (RFP) open to all qualified suppliers.

**Language Requirements:**
The bidder must be fluent in either official language of Canada (French or English).

**Contact Information:**
For any queries related to this procurement, please contact:

Address: 400 Cooper St, 6th Floor, Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 2N1
Phone: (613) 296-6951
Email: [Brian.Humphries@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:Brian.Humphries@ssc- spc.gc.ca)
